title: Will Breathing Sensors Blow up Bike Racing? Unpacking the Potential of Visma’s ‘Transformational’ Tool
content:
'It could be as big a breakthrough as the first heart rate monitor': Visma-Lease a Bike is using a powerful new wearable from Tymewear that brings fourth dimension performance insights.

Read the full article at Will Breathing Sensors Blow up Bike Racing? Unpacking the Potential of Visma’s ‘Transformational’ Tool on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
